page.title: 15Entertainment.
page.content: In our area the most entertaining place to go is the King George V Playing Fields.It has 8 hardcourt tennis courts,2 hockey pitches and 8 bowling gree.There is a children,s play area and an unemployment office which is rarely open.In the summer there's a play scheme. There is a church called Our Lady's it has a Family Centre.It also has youth clubs,C.W.L.(Catholic womens league),a S.V.P. (Saint Vincent de Paul),a Mothers,a Young Wives,Family and a babies club. There are 2 youth clubs in this area. the Methodist Church has similar clubs to Our Lady's.The Hyde Club is a like Our Lady's.The Community Centre at Woodhall Parade is used by many local organisations like the Chess Club and the Over-Sixties Club.
